thread.title: Naked gunman kills four at Waffle House in Tennessee

title: Naked gunman kills four at Waffle House in Tennessee
text:
Naked gunman kills four at Waffle House in Tennessee 9:22am EDT - 01:06 
Police say a naked gunman armed with an AR-15 style assault rifle opened fire at a Waffle House near Nashville, Tennessee early Sunday morning killing four people and injuring several others. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Police say a naked gunman armed with an AR-15 style assault rifle opened fire at a Waffle House near Nashville, Tennessee early Sunday morning killing four people and injuring several others. Linda So reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2K6nH67
